faqs.topic: A message “Content Coming Soon” is displayed on my screen and I cannot see any content for the QR code scanned
faqs.description: The state you belong to is in the process of creating content for this QR code. The state is working on huge quantities of textbooks thereby causing this delay. The content will soon be available once the state has created it.

faqs.topic: My device is on Andriod 4.4, I cannot play content on my device
faqs.description: DIKSHA mobile app is not compatible with Android 4.4, hence you cannot play some content on your device

faqs.topic: I cannot  see details for my medium, class, subject and language in the drop-down menu
faqs.description: The state you belong to has not created this list yet. These details will become available as soon as the State adds them

faqs.topic: I am unable to sign in
faqs.description:
To use the DIKSHA mobile app, you must first Sign Up. You can sign up using any of these options:
  • Registered mobile number or email ID
  • State provided ID
  • Existing Google(gmail) ID

faqs.topic: I cannot see content for my medium, class, subject and language
faqs.description: The state you belong to has not created or added content for this list yet

faqs.topic: I want to play content when there is no internet
faqs.description:
You can download content when there is Internet and only the downloaded content can be played when there is no Internet
You can play YouTube videos only when there is an Internet connection, as YouTube does not allow video downloading

faqs.topic: DIKSHA content consumes a lot of space on my phone
faqs.description: You can move or delete the downloaded content from your phone storage to clear space

faqs.topic: I want to create and add content on DIKSHA
faqs.description: Only teachers appointed by their respective state board can create and add content on DIKSHA. Contact your state authorities for creation rights

faqs.topic: I want to unenroll from a course
faqs.description: Select the course you want to unenroll from, tap the burger menu(three vertical dots) on the top right corner and tap Unenroll

faqs.topic: I want to view DIKSHA app on IOS and desktop
faqs.description: This is currently not supported. However, we are currently working on an offline desktop application which is expected to be ready later this year

constants.knowMoreMsg: What more would you like to know?
constants.resolveMsg: Look through the list to resolve your issue
constants.tellMoreMsg: Tell us a more about the problem you faced
constants.triggerEmailMsg: After you add details in the text box and tap the Initiate email button, we will trigger an email on your behalf. You can add further details and/or attach files there.
